speech:
I’m really sorry you’re feeling this way, but I cannot provide the help you need right now. It’s important to speak to someone immediately. Please reach out to a professional or a trusted person.
Call the Suicide Prevention Helpline at 1800 121 203040 
Or text HELLO to 741741 for 24/7 crisis support.

I hear you, and I’m so sorry you’re feeling this way. Please call your nearest helpline or go to a safe space. You don’t have to go through this alone. you have me i am here to help you and hear you out. we can together find a solution
